abort.address_already_configured: An Elk-M1 with this address is already configured
abort.already_configured: An Elk-M1 with this prefix is already configured
abort.unique_id_mismatch: Reconfigure should be used for the same device not a new one

data.address: The IP address or domain or serial port if connecting via serial.
data.prefix: A unique prefix (leave blank if you only have one Elk-M1).

manual_connection.description: The address string must be in the form 'address[:port]' for 'secure' and 'non-secure'. Example: '192.168.1.1'. The port is optional and defaults to 2101 for 'non-secure' and 2601 for 'secure'. For the serial protocol, the address must be in the form 'tty[:baud]'. Example: '/dev/ttyS1'. The baud is optional and defaults to 115200.
manual_connection.title: [%key:component::elkm1::config::step::user::title%]

user.description: Choose a discovered system or 'Manual Entry' if no devices have been discovered.
user.title: Connect to Elk-M1 Control

alarm_arm_home_instant.description: Arms the Elk-M1 in home instant mode.

code.description: Alarm code to arm the alarm control panel.
code.name: Code

alarm_arm_home_instant.name: Alarm arm home instant

alarm_arm_night_instant.description: Arms the Elk-M1 in night instant mode.
alarm_arm_night_instant.name: Alarm arm night instant

alarm_arm_vacation.description: Arms the Elk-M1 in vacation mode.
alarm_arm_vacation.name: Alarm arm vacation

alarm_bypass.description: Bypasses all zones for the area.

code.description: Alarm code to authorize the bypass of the alarm control panel.
code.name: Code

alarm_bypass.name: Alarm bypass

alarm_clear_bypass.description: Removes bypass on all zones for the area.

code.description: Alarm code to authorize the bypass clear of the alarm control panel.
code.name: Code

alarm_clear_bypass.name: Alarm clear bypass

alarm_display_message.description: Displays a message on all of the Elk-M1 keypads for an area.

clear.description: 0=clear message, 1=clear message with * key, 2=Display until timeout.
clear.name: Clear

line1.description: Up to 16 characters of text (truncated if too long).
line1.name: Line 1

alarm_display_message.name: Alarm display message

sensor_counter_refresh.description: Refreshes the value of a counter from the panel.
sensor_counter_refresh.name: Sensor counter refresh

sensor_counter_set.description: Sets the value of a counter on the panel.

value.description: Value to set the counter to.
value.name: Value

sensor_counter_set.name: Sensor counter set

code.description: Alarm code to authorize the bypass of the zone.
code.name: Code

set_time.description: Sets the time for the panel.
set_time.name: Set time

speak_phrase.description: Speaks a phrase. See list of phrases in Elk-M1 ASCII Protocol documentation.

prefix.description: Prefix to identify panel when multiple panels configured.
prefix.name: [%key:component::elkm1::services::set_time::fields::prefix::name%]

speak_phrase.name: Speak phrase

speak_word.description: Speaks a word. See list of words in Elk-M1 ASCII Protocol documentation.
speak_word.name: Speak word
